thread.section_title: Nebraska Furniture Mart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nebraska Furniture Mart | nfm.com | 21 of 465
thread.title: LACEY S.
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by LACEY S.

author: LACEY S.
title: LACEY S.
text: NFM has pretty agreeable prices for pretty much all items. The interest free financing option is what is most appealing for big ticket item purchases like laptops, cameras, any type of furniture, etc. Customer service in store and over the phone has always been great to me. Overall, I'd say this is a company that is one of my Nebraska favorites for sure!
